00108 Number.prototype.fromNow = function () {
00109     var c = {};
00110     c[this._dateElement] = this;
00111     return Date.now().add(c);
00112 };
00113 
00129 Number.prototype.ago = function () {
00130     var c = {};
00131     c[this._dateElement] = this * -1;
00132     return Date.now().add(c);
00133 };

00135 // Build dynamic date element, month name and day name functions.
00136 (function () {
00137     var $D = Date.prototype, $N = Number.prototype;
00138 
00139     /* Do NOT modify the following string tokens. These tokens are used to build dynamic functions. */
00140     var dx = ("sunday monday tuesday wednesday thursday friday saturday").split(/\s/),
00141         mx = ("january february march april may june july august september october november december").split(/\s/),
00142         px = ("Millisecond Second Minute Hour Day Week Month Year").split(/\s/),
00143         de;
00144     
00145     // Create day name functions and abbreviated day name functions (eg. monday(), friday(), fri()).
00146     var df = function (n) {
00147         return function () { 
00148             if (this._is) { 
00149                 this._is = false; 
00150                 return this.getDay() == n; 
00151             }
00152             return this.moveToDayOfWeek(n, this._orient);
00153         };
00154     };
00155     
00156     for (var i = 0 ; i < dx.length ; i++) { 
00157         $D[dx[i]] = $D[dx[i].substring(0, 3)] = df(i);
00158     }
00159     
00160     // Create month name functions and abbreviated month name functions (eg. january(), march(), mar()).
00161     var mf = function (n) { 
00162         return function () {
00163             if (this._is) { 
00164                 this._is = false; 
00165                 return this.getMonth() === n; 
00166             }
00167             return this.moveToMonth(n, this._orient); 
00168         };
00169     };
00170     
00171     for (var j = 0 ; j < mx.length ; j++) { 
00172         $D[mx[j]] = $D[mx[j].substring(0, 3)] = mf(j);
00173     }
00174     
00175     // Create date element functions and plural date element functions used with Date (eg. day(), days(), months()).
00176     var ef = function (j) { 
00177         return function () {
00178             if (j.substring(j.length - 1) != "s") { 
00179                 j += "s"; 
00180             }
00181             return this["add" + j](this._orient); 
00182         };
00183     };
00184     
00185     // Create date element functions and plural date element functions used with Number (eg. day(), days(), months()).
00186     var nf = function (n) {
00187         return function () {
00188             this._dateElement = n;
00189             return this;
00190         };
00191     };
00192     
00193     for (var k = 0 ; k < px.length ; k++) {
00194         de = px[k].toLowerCase();
00195         $D[de] = $D[de + "s"] = ef(px[k]);
00196         $N[de] = $N[de + "s"] = nf(de);
00197     }
00198 }());

00244 Date.prototype.getOrdinal = function () {
00245     switch (this.getDate()) {
00246     case 1: 
00247     case 21: 
00248     case 31: 
00249         return "st";
00250     case 2: 
00251     case 22: 
00252         return "nd";
00253     case 3: 
00254     case 23: 
00255         return "rd";
00256     default: 
00257         return "th";
00258     }
00259 };
